name: Fireball Scroll
description: A scroll imbued with the power of fireball spell.
looks: The scroll is made of aged parchment and sealed with a wax seal. It radiates a warm glow.

special_effects.area_of_effect: Deals fire damage to all enemies within the blast radius.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Legendary Bow
description: A bow of unparalleled power and accuracy, said to have been crafted by the gods themselves.
looks: The Legendary Bow is made of a rare, shimmering metal that glows with an otherworldly light. The limbs of the bow are adorned with intricate engravings depicting mythical creatures. The string is made of a material that seems to shimmer and change colors.

special_weapon_skills.Archery Mastery: Greatly increases damage and accuracy with bows.

special_effects.Divine Precision: Attacks from this bow have a high chance to hit critical weak spots, dealing massive damage.

name: Staff of the Arcane
description: A powerful staff infused with mystical energies.
looks: The staff is made of polished mahogany and has gold accents. It is adorned with intricate runes that glow with a soft blue light.

special_effects.spell_power: Increases the power of spells by 20%.

name: Staff of the Elements
description: A powerful staff that harnesses the power of the elements.
looks: The staff has a long wooden shaft with intricate engravings representing each element - fire, water, air, earth, light, and darkness. At the top of the staff, small crystals of different colors emit a faint glow.

special_weapon_skills.Elemental Mastery: Increases the damage of elemental spells by 25%.

special_effects.Elemental Burst: 25% chance to unleash a powerful burst of elemental energy upon successful hit.

name: Enchanted Sword
description: A magical sword imbued with powerful enchantments.
looks: The sword has a shining silver blade with intricate runes etched into its surface. The hilt is made of polished ebony and adorned with a sparkling gemstone.

special_effects.elemental_damage: Adds additional fire damage to attacks

name: Ring of Protection
description: A magical ring that provides enhanced defense and protection.
looks: The ring has a simple design with a silver band and an engraved shield motif.

special_effects.shielding_spell: Activate to create a temporary protective energy shield.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A magical staff that radiates healing energy.
looks: The staff is made of polished wood and adorned with shimmering crystals. It emits a soft and calming light.

special_effects.healing_aura: Emits a healing aura that regenerates nearby allies' health over time.
